text: Sant'Antonio di Gallura (Sant'Antòni di Caragnàni, Sant'Antòni de Calanzànos) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sassari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 1,520 people lived there. It covers an area is 81.69 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 354 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Sassari
title: Sant'Antonio di Gallura
